caption.p: Prokaryotic communities in Tibetan Plateau soils are associated strongly with soil C:N ratios. Prokaryotic community compositional structure in the Tibetan Plateau soils as indicated by nonmetric multidimensional scaling plots. Sites are color coded according to soil C:N ratios. (A) Based on Bray-Curtis distance. (B) Based on unweighted UniFrac distance. (C) Based on weighted UniFrac distance.
